outflow.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when money, goods etc leave a bank, country etc

outflow.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the flow of water or air from something

outflow.translation[1].definitions[0].de: money which is being taken out of a company, country etc
outflow.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The insurance company paid over $1.33 billion to policyholders, creating a vast cash outflow.
